<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Kobold Scout](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3073)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Most kobolds encountered outside of a well-defended warren or lair are kobold scouts, those trained for stalking and hunting. They're also often in the thick of the fighting when a warren is invaded, buying time for their comrades to set up various traps and deadfalls.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Kobold Scout](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3073)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=759" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 210 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +8; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Sakvroth](/Languages.aspx?ID=118)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +3, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=67) (20 bolts), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +5 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +6 

+1 circumstance to all defenses vs. [traps](/Traits.aspx?ID=715)
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 16

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortsword +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d6 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
crossbow +9 ([range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d8 piercing

**Construct Trap** <actions string="Three Actions" /> ([Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) The kobold scout creates a rudimentary trap on any square adjacent to it. This must be on a surface, such as a floor, wall, or ceiling. The trap activates the next time a creature moves adjacent to it. The creature takes 1d6 piercing damage and 1 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) with a DC 16 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save. The trap is destroyed when activated or after 1 hour, whichever comes first. The scout typically carries enough raw materials to make one trap.

**Scamper** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The kobold scout is adjacent to at least one enemy; **Effect** The kobold scout Strides up to their Speed plus 5 feet and gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by this movement. They must end this movement in a space that's not adjacent to any enemy.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The kobold scout deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) creatures.

</column>
